00012 /*Convertion function-like macro to interger types to*/
00013 #define get_u8(X,O)  (*(__u8 *)(X + O))
00014 #define get_u16(X,O)  (*(__u16 *)(X + O))
00015 #define get_u32(X,O)  (*(__u32 *)(X + O))
00016 /*Smallest classification number*/
00017 #define UP_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER 200  //minor classification number
00018 #define DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER 101  //minor classification number
00019 #define HTTP_SUPER_CLASS_NUMBER 201  //minor classification number
00020 #define SSL_SUPER_CLASS_NUMBER 1300  //minor classification number
00021 
00022 /* The last column of the flow file (printed file) identify the tranport protocol below the IP, it can be filled
00023  * with one of these numbers: 0 for UDP and 1 for TCP
00024  * or it also can be filled with 2 that identifies ICMP or 3 (Unknown type)
00025  */
00026
